text: World's first plague vaccine was made with ghee. It appalled high-caste Hindus, Parsis In 'The Moral Contagion', Julia Hauser and Sarnath Banerjee document how civilisations over hundreds of years dealt with plagues. Palestinians inspect the site after Israeli bombs on Rafah flattened a mosque and destroyed homes, amid the ongoing conflict between Israel and the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas. SOUNDBITE, Tayseer Abu Hamid: 01:55-02:05 What happened last night was that someone called our neighbor by telephone, he said, "You have 20 minutes to leave the area because we will attack it." 02:06-02:15 After 20 minutes the explosion happened and it was so huge. 02:16-02:44 After the house was attacked, the same call came and and he was asked if he was okay or not. Then he said I would bomb the mosque, tell the people here to leave the area 200 meters away. It was just like an earthquake. And I was so shocked.
